TopicTitle: What parts would you like to see in KSP?

Articles.Content: If parts were to be added to stock KSP, what would you want them to be?
Air augmented rockets.
I'd want weather balloons and size 2 SRB's and nukes.
E: all of the above

can you put an "all of the above" selection?

cause i want all of them
Should I vote for "rocket parts" if I want stations and other rocket-launched manned spacecraft parts?
+ related science and contracts

command&control

-a bigger crew capsule for the 3.25 size (for example: taurus HCV)

fuel and other resources

-intake air tanks

engines and other means of transportation

-maybe an anchor (something that actually sinks)

-solar sails

-a big nuclear engine

structural

-strut-like octagonal struts (strutlike as in: placed the same way as a strut)

-dead weight (for balancing and testing purposes)

utility

-landing legs for water (don't know what they're called)

-shock absorbers or airbags

electronics and thermodynamica

-heat sink (for places you cant put a radiator)

-thermo-electric generator (we have a nuclear reactor that produces heat (theoretically) and converts that heat into energy, so why can't we have the technology to make energy out of heat that isn't produced by blutonium, like maybe... the ship itself)

science

-science experiments for asteroids

-water science (maybe even from the bottom of the ocean)

miscellanious

-5 meter, 6.25 meter, 7,5 meter, 8,75 meter and 10 meter parts

-proper parts for VTOLs

Edited August 23, 2015 by nikokespprfan

I want more command pods with awesome IVA, and I want the 3 man capsule to be like apollo, I don't want one guy under the other 2.

Space Station parts, I want pieces for space stations.

I want more 1.25M engines

more fueltanks

I want radial draco like engines for landing my capsules

more crew storage, with IVA

more cargo bays 1.25m, 2.5m, and 3.75

I hate when cargobays aren't long enough, I like having stuff in my cargo bays.

Inflatable Habitats, like NASA plans, and ESA WITH IVA

AND MORE IVA

I REALLY WANT MORE IVA,

I CANNOT STRESS ANYMORE, I WANT IVA

BIG OPEN IVA FOR STATIONS!

SMALL FOR CAPSULES

MEDIUM FOR CREW STORAGE(LIKE HITCHHIKER)

IVA is my life

RPM stock, please

Yes to all, except maybe plane parts as we seem to have a lot.

Add to that: Struts that can be placed EVA. (Yes I know there is at least 1 active mod that has this. I want it stock)
An electric ducted fan.

Wow.... I couldn't have said it better myself, except for one small detail you forgot to mention...

MORE IVA!!!! hehehe I love to dock in IVA....

I'm liking a lot of these suggestions. One that I haven't seen so far but would be nice would be a 3.75m heavy aerospike engine, for better efficiency in a first stage at the cost of less raw thrust than a Mammoth.

I'd also love to have a lot more science experiment parts as well - let's say, for example, an optical space telescope that we can IVA in to actually peer through at various targets, or an X-ray telescope, a scientific sample-return device, magnetometer on a deployable boom, radiation meters and particle counters and spectrometers... there's a lot of possibilities here! If they can display some kind of useful data that provides more than mere science points that'd be even better.
If you don't like any of the options in the poll, feel free to leave your thoughts in the comments.
Oh, I forgot to mention that I really want a 4 or 5 way heavy-duty RCS thruster pod, either Vernor-based or using monoprop. Streamlining it would be extra cool.

My most-desired parts at the moment, all aimed at reducing part counts and/or improving aesthetics:

- A 2.5m LF-only tank for nuclear rocket use.

- A 2.5m SRB, so I don't need to cluster them like this.

- A 1.25m crew can (I understand this is coming in 1.1)

- A 2.5m equivalent to the Rapier or Turboramjet. I know there is a 2.5m jet coming but it doesn't seem to be suitable for spaceplanes. Not sure why we have so many airliner parts in a space game.

Really though, I wish that the older rocket parts would get an art pass bringing them up to the standard of the newer spaceplane parts. It's quite visually jarring when they are used together.

Tweakables for parts, and part name/tag searcher. This could allow more parts to be added. Something like tweakscale, but it would switch to another existing. Not only size, but functionality could be changed.There could be 3 options: diameter; size; usage. These are all obvious, expect for usage: for rockets: SRB, Lower-stage, Mid-stage, Upper-stage, Nuke, and radial. With planes: Basic jet, Turbojet, RAPIER, ect.

And new parts?

2m nukes, all nukes nerfed in a different way (not by lowering TWR) (I will make a suggestion thread of this soon)

3m upper-stage engine. Great efficiency, but no ugility stuffs such as gimbal or power gen. *Edit: lower thrust. Maybe 1000? You know... Analog with the terrier and the poodle.

scramjet (I will renew the old thread and update my test mod soon)

Edited August 24, 2015 by CaptainTurbomuffin
